name: Dash Hero
description:
Play as a dark knight with a Dash power

kill ghosts with sword and collect their souls to make a delicious juice ! go from a platform to another with your special power 🤩

game play is pretty simple, just dash, kill and don't fall

control with mouse only

Note : game isn't done here, it's just the start, be ready for further updates in our itch.io page : https://omarmyousef.itch.io/dash-hero
There will be more characters, worlds, enemies and swords 😄

Game requires DX to run correctly on your pc

EDIT : Game unfortunately doesn't include sounds, we just noticed that after 2 mins from the deadline, so please try to imagine how sounds gonna be like if it's
exists
